structure.unit: CLERKS, STENOGRAPHIC REPORTERS, INTERPRETERS AND EXAMINERS (Superseded)

law.history: Repealed 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 491 and sec. 492(7). -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. II, sec. 9(1). -- Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 357, sec. 1. -- Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 204, sec. 2. -- Amended 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 240, sec. 1. -- Amended 1944 Ky. Acts ch. 162, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2290-2.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Jurors to be paid by circuit clerk -- Compensation of clerk.
